roleset.name: essentially equivalent

role.descr: domain in which the two things are equivalent

example.text: Privatization is tantamount to handing over all of China 's wealth to the American financial rogues .
example.arg: to handing over all of China 's wealth to the American financial rogues

example.name: arg1 and arg3
example.text: The experiences that students encounter over the course of their education are tantamount in importance to instilling a life-long love of learning.
example.arg: The experiences that students encounter over the course of their education
in importance to instilling a life-long love of learning.

roleset.note: TANTAMOUNT-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-6. (from tantamount.01-j)
